players.name: Bob
memory: You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Diana: "Alice's death is a tragedy. Let's discuss calmly and figure out who might be the mafia."
You: "I am the detective and I investigated Diana last night. She is the mafioso."
Charlie: "Bob claims to be the detective and says Diana is the mafioso. I don't have any special abilities, so I'll have to rely on what others say and try to deduce who is lying."

Charlie: "Bob claims to be the detective and says Diana is the mafioso. I don't have any special abilities, so I'll have to rely on what others say and try to deduce who is lying. Since Alice is dead, we only have Bob and Diana left..."
Votes: Bob voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
